title: Implement secure customer login
description: As a customer, I want to log in securely so that my account remains protected.
attributes_and_rules: Must use multi-factor authentication methods such as OTP, biometrics, or email verification.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Customer logins are verified using MFA. 2. Logins are secure and account protection is ensured.
test_cases: Given a customer, When they log in, Then they must use MFA for verification.

title: Design responsive UI
description: As a customer, I want a responsive user interface so that I can use the portal on any device.
attributes_and_rules: UI should be mobile-friendly and adjust seamlessly across devices.
acceptance_criteria: 1. The portal interface adapts to different devices. 2. User experience is consistent across devices.
test_cases: Given a device, When the portal is accessed, Then the UI should adjust to the device.

title: Display account details on dashboard
description: As a customer, I want to see my account details on the dashboard so that I can manage my finances.
attributes_and_rules: Dashboard must display relevant account information based on user profile.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Dashboard displays account summaries. 2. Information is personalized based on customer profile.
test_cases: Given a customer, When they view the dashboard, Then they see their account details.

title: Open accounts online
description: As a customer, I want to open bank accounts online so that I can start banking without branch visits.
attributes_and_rules: Workflows must be simplified and efficient for online account openings.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Customers can open accounts online. 2. Process is simplified and minimal steps are required.
test_cases: Given a customer, When they apply to open a bank account online, Then the account can be opened with minimal steps.

title: Provide real-time status updates
description: As a customer, I want real-time updates on my requests so that I know their status.
attributes_and_rules: Status updates and notifications must be in real time.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Customers receive real-time status updates. 2. Notifications are sent automatically.
test_cases: Given a request, When the status updates, Then the customer receives a real-time notification.

title: Upload documents securely
description: As a customer, I want to upload documents securely so that my information remains protected.
attributes_and_rules: Document uploads must be secure with encryption.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Documents are uploaded securely. 2. Encryption is used for data protection.
test_cases: Given a customer, When they upload a document, Then the document is uploaded securely.

title: Define user roles
description: As an administrator, I want to define user roles so that each user has appropriate access.
attributes_and_rules: Roles must include customers, tellers, and administrators.
acceptance_criteria: 1. User roles are defined. 2. Access is controlled based on roles.
test_cases: Given an administrator, When they define roles, Then users have appropriate access levels.

title: Develop APIs for data synchronization
description: As a system, I want to sync data with the core banking platform so that information stays consistent.
attributes_and_rules: APIs must ensure secure data synchronization.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Data is synchronized securely. 2. Real-time updates are maintained.
test_cases: Given the core banking system, When data is updated, Then it syncs with the portal.

epic_title: Data Security and Audit Trail Management
title: Encrypt sensitive data
description: As a system, I want to encrypt personal and financial data so that customer information is secure.
attributes_and_rules: Data must be encrypted both at rest and in transit.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Data is encrypted. 2. Information security is ensured.
test_cases: Given customer data, When it is stored or transmitted, Then it must be encrypted.
